page.title: 12Changing Times in W Wickham
page.content:
There are many more families with two cars than there were. Therefore more cars are parked in the road. More people now live in W Wickham and the shops have had to change to allow for this. Many shoppers come from outside W Wickham. In 1964 there were no restau- rants in the High Street, but now there are six. e chemist's is built where W Wickham's cinema used to be. The parks, gardens and even roundabouts are better looked after now, with more flowers be- ing planted. Clare Aylott, Oak Lodge.
Changing needs are shown by the de- molition last year of the house by the station to make way for old people's flats. The swimming bath, built in the mid-1960's, is a major local amenity. Naomi Britz, Oak Lodge.
